name: shuffle
description: Shuffle dem cards.

name: see-the-future
description: See the next 3 cards. It's like cheating, except not.

name: skip
description: Run away from your responsibilities. End your turn without drawing.

name: attack
description: End your turn without drawing, and drop a deuce on the next guy
